title: Please ID font
content:
Hello, does anyone know which font this is? Thank you so much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeID_6164.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type ID.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052703/http:/typophile.com/files/type%20ID_0.jpg) | 30.86 KB |
author: brstein

comments.content:
It looks like **[ITC Caslon 224 (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052703/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Caslon%20224%20-%20Bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=69ac7aa28a7999b6ad9dedae4a4ed424&wrap=2&text=Inspiring%20history)**

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052703/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
That is it.... Wonderful. Thank you so much!!!!
